name: NZ vs Loons
description: Short oval contact racing from both sides of the world. New Zealand brings you the NZ Stockcars on real life tracks. UK introduces you to Loons. Saloon cars with big bumpers! So whether you are looking to put someone up the wall in the NZ's or run 5 wide in the saloons this game is for you. This is a development game and the outcome will decide which formula gets made next into a full game.
